Newcastle under Lyme this morning trying to find a survive the landfill fumes. Westlands honks again, air purifier on over drive & can still smell it, need inhaler. Come on now @JamesBevanEA Close it & prosecute ASAP @PHE_EoEngland   @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/jNGFhLYlly

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland i went on my bike last night. it was lovely riding around audley/scott hay. but as soon as i came back down the a34 towards newcastle i was hit with a wall of stench. i was wheezy all night after. like exercise induced asthma (which Ive never experienced before)

Tick Tock @RedIndustries2 Looking forward to fresh air in 3 days. In the meantime we breathe in the flames from your hell pit landfill. We cant breathe! @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Gtn257ZCdq

tweets.text: The @PHE_uk cannot interpret data without using the correct parameters and the @EnvAgency data is not precise enough to be used for health trends. Just another red herring? @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/4alcoC7h2v
@jenpot It's not great...I walked along at 730 this eve it's been traced and @EnvAgencyAnglia are @EnvAgencySE are looking into it we hope

@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg 29 weeks pregnant and I cannot be in my own living room due to the smell tonight! Burning throat, nose & almost throwing up...it‚Äôs now in our loft room so no escaping it! No words to explain to my 3 year old why I moved her here from a happy home....

This is about a lot more than the smell of a landfill. Emissions of hydrogen sulphide are way in excess of WHO guidelines. The @EnvAgency has been slow to act but is now starting to get somewhere. The firm has in the past resorted to threatening local people and the local MP.
@WickfordWombles It's still bad now.
@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids I don‚Äôt understand how the EA are still debating this? Our homes smell and people are ill. It‚Äôs simple, close it down#stopthestink
